name: frontend-stack
description: Personal frontend dev-stack based on NPM (and not Gulp/Grunt).

scripts.dev: concurrently 'npm run html:serve' 'npm run html:watch' 'npm run styles:watch' 'npm run images:watch'
scripts.build: concurrently 'npm run html:build' 'npm run styles:build' 'npm run images:build'
scripts.styles:build: npm run styles && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' < ./build/default.css | postcss --use cssnano > dist/default.min.css
